name: The Bonham Hotel
description: A stylish boutique hotel in Edinburghs West End. Wonderfully situated on a quiet, leafy crescentand just a stones throw away from Edinburghs iconic attractions, sightseeing, shopping areas, and dozens of charming cafs and classic pubsThe Bonham Hotel, Edinburgh is one of the citys most stylish hotels. This boutique hotel features 49 individually styled rooms and suites, as well as flexible events spaces for private dining, cocktail parties, small weddings, and meetings. The Restaurant at The Bonham has a sophisticated urban dining menu inspired by classic flavours, and is crafted with locally sourced ingredients. For a calming retreat in an intimate space, enjoy afternoon tea, post-work cocktails, or pre-dinner drinks at The Consulting Room bar.Free, superfast Wi-Fi with a maximum bandwidth of 100MB is available throughout the hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: Market Street Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Edinburgh, just a few minutes’ walk from the Royal Mile and 650 yards of The Real Mary King's Close, Market Street forms part of Edinburgh’s historic skyline. The hotel features a rooftop lounge and each room boasts free high-speed WiFi. The hotel is around 700 metres from Camera Obscura and World of Illusions, 1 km from Edinburgh Castle and 1.1 km from National Museum of Scotland. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. Each boutique-style room features locally made fabrics, locally curated artwork and a locally roasted coffee blend alongside bespoke design furniture. Each comes with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have city views, while all feature Chromecast and Apple TV. The rooftop Champagne lounge Nor’ Loft serving breakfast, small plates and drinks with stunning panoramic city views. Edinburgh Playhouse is 1.1 km from Market Street hotel, while University of Edinburgh is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Britannia Edinburgh Hotel
description: Situated on the banks of the Water of Leith in a quiet secluded area, this property offers free Wi-Fi and a central location in Edinburgh. The popular shops of Princes Street are just 15 minutes' walk away. Rooms at Britannia Edinburgh Hotel are elegant in style, and each features a TV and an en suite bathroom. There is an on-site restaurant and bar where guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch and evening meals. The magnificent Edinburgh Castle, standing high above the old city, is around 2 miles from the hotel.

name: Summer Stays at The University of Edinburgh
description: Located at the foot of the royal Holyrood Park and Arthur's Seat, the Pollock Estate campus offers bed and breakfast accommodation during the University of Edinburgh's summer vacation. Each room on the campus features a free Wi-Fi, and shared laundry and pantry facilities. Some rooms also offer a TV and a safety deposit box. Linen and towels are provided in all the rooms. Pollock Estate is just 1.5 miles from Edinburgh Waverley Rail Station and the historic Old Town, where guests can find the Royal Mile, the hub for many of Edinburgh’s festivals. In the mornings, an extensive breakfast is offered in the self-service restaurant at John McIntyre Conference Centre. This is just 5 minutes’ walk from the rooms. Further local amenities include a general shop and a dedicated 24-hour reception centre. "From 21st August, contractors will be on-site to complete essential pipework within the Pollock Estate, which may result in noise at times. We apologise for any disturbances this may cause. Access routes to certain buildings may be temporarily restricted but alternative walking routes will be clearly signposted. Contractors will be onsite between the hours of 8.30am – 5pm Monday to Friday. Thank you for your understanding and support as we work to maintain our infrastructure."

name: Angels Share Hotel
description: The location of Angels Share Hotel in Edinburgh combines the pulse of the city at your fingertips yet with famous Edinburgh leafy avenues a mere stroll away. From the sanctuary of the hotel and our lively bar, our focus is to provide you with an unrivalled experience. Conveniently located at the West End of Princes Street at the hub of Edinburghs shopping and central business district, Angels Share Hotel is easily accessed from the airport, train and bus stations. On approach to the hotel, you become fully absorbed by the spirit of Edinburgh as you are treated to a grand view of Edinburghs most sublime attraction Edinburgh CastleAlthough the eighteenth century building still retains many of its period features, Angels Share has managed to blend the historical with cutting edge design in a seamless fashion. With ultimate comfort in mind the design of our bedrooms revolve around its principal feature the bed. Generous in size, the beds are made more luxurious by the Egyptian cotton sheets and sumptuous pillows that appeal to your desire to lounge. From this position you are invited to indulge in a whole host of pleasures.No matter whether on business or at play people like to keep in touch. Our bedrooms have been equipped with wireless broadband providing you with speedy access to the world at large. If you prefer to receive your news in traditional form a newspaper of your choice can be delivered to your door each morning. Whats more our knowledgeable staff will be delighted to keep you abreast of all thats happening in Edinburgh and will be thrilled to make any bookings on your behalf.Edinburgh has an amazing bar scene with more diversity than you would find in cities four times the size! And one of the best is only a short ride away in the elevator. Angels Share Bar provides a lively vantage point to delight in the joys of the city. Our bar and kitchens have it covered and are open for breakfast right through to a late supper.Whatever the plans for your stay Angels Share Hotel gives you the perfect base to relax and enjoy Edinburgh culture.Rates are inclusive of service charge and VAT (excluding Tourist Tax)iHotelier/iStay

name: Yotel Edinburgh
description: Conveniently located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Edinburgh. Those staying at the property can also enjoy free wireless internet. There are a variety of amenities at YOTEL Edinburgh on offer to guests, such as a coffee bar, an express check-in and check-out feature and a gym. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a laptop safe, a hair dryer and a rain shower. They come with ironing facilities and a desk. Those staying at the property can start the day with breakfast each morning at YOTEL Edinburgh before venturing out to explore the surrounding region. Edinburgh's attractions, including Princes Street, are within easy walking distance of YOTEL Edinburgh. It is a short stroll from Edinburgh Castle.Revato

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Edinburgh
description: Leonardo Royal Hotel Edinburgh - Formerly Jurys Inn is In the heart of Edinburgh's Old Town, right beside the Royal Mile and less than a 5-minute walk from Waverly Train Station. The bedrooms feature Dream beds with crisp white linens, large-screen TVs and spacious bathrooms with spa toiletries, as well as large work space area, tea and coffee refreshment dock and high-speed WiFi. The modern restaurant offers an international dinner menu. The bar serves lunch and snacks as well as coffee. Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street, Holyrood Palace, the International Conference Centre are within short walking distance, as well as shops, theatres, museums and galleries. Edinburgh Airport is 14 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Edinburgh.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Edinburgh
description: Courtyard by Marriott® Edinburgh, located at the heart of the Scottish capital, combining heritage and style with innovative design and locally inspired furnishings. Whether you're in Edinburgh for business or pleasure, our hotel provides all you need for a productive visit. Our prime location is just 7 minutes from The University of Edinburgh, 5 minutes from Princes Street, Waverley Station, the Edinburgh Tram on York Place, and 20 minutes from Edinburgh Airport. Our spacious, modern hotel rooms include quality amenities, such as a selection of in-room entertainment, plush bedding, and Nirvae Botanicals toiletries. Enjoy a refreshingly modern take on locally sourced food at our Lantern Room Restaurant & Bar or relax in our sophisticated lobby after a long day. Our hotel's outstanding central location situates you close to many local businesses, destinations and attractions such as Playhouse Theatre. Book your visit to the Courtyard Edinburgh, where we look forward to providing you with an exceptional stay.Marriott

name: Le Monde Hotel
description: Located within the heart of Edinburgh on George Street, just off Princes Street. Le Monde Hotel which draws inspiration from the most exciting and iconic cities around the globe, this luxury boutique hotel offers stylishly designed rooms and suites providing the highest standard of comfort, decorated with their own distinctive creativity and attention to detail.Rates are inclusive of service charge and VAT (excluding Tourist Tax)iHotelier/iStay

name: 24 Royal Terrace
description: Situated in central Edinburgh at the foot of Calton Hill, 24 Royal Terrace is nestled amongst the grand Georgian townhouses of Royal Terrace; a quiet, cobbled street just a short walk from the buzz of the city. This stylish boutique hotel has the added touch of the owner’s ever-changing art collection. Each of the 15 rooms are delicately furnished with premium Egyptian cotton linen, a lambswool throw and bathrobes. The advanced in-room technology offers Smart-TVs with on-demand streaming, an HD soundbar, Apple Airplay and free high-speed WiFi throughout. After a day of exploring, guests can unwind at "Dinna Tell" the hotel's Bar and Garden which offers delicious signature cocktails, wines, whiskies and snacks. The Edinburgh Playhouse is 0.4 miles away, the Omni Centre is 500 metres from 24 Royal Terrace, and Edinburgh Waverley Train Station is a 14-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, which is easily accessible via the Tram. The nearest Tram stop is on York Place, is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Alternatively by taxi or car, the journey would take around 30 minutes.

name: St. Christopher's Inn Edinburgh - Hostel
description: No description found

name: Edinburgh Holyrood Hotel
description: Edinburgh Holyrood Hotel is conveniently located in the heart of Edinburgh's historic and beautiful old town. This 4-star hotel is just a 15-minute walk from Waverley Railway station and the bustle of the city's main thoroughfare, Princes Street. Edinburgh Holyrood Hotel is the ideal base for exploring this fascinating and unique city and comes complete with all the service and amenities you need to relax and make the most of your time in this historic city. History buffs are spoiled for choice when it comes to finding things to do in Edinburgh. Start your adventure on the historic Royal Mile, connecting the imposing Edinburgh Castle and majestic Palace of Holyrood House, an official Royal residence. The hotel features 157 en-suite bedrooms - the perfect place to relax after a day of excitement and fun. Pamper yourself in our luxurious spa in Edinburgh, take a dip in our 14m heated pool, and enjoy a meal in our Surf & Turf Restaurant or sample a cocktail or two in our elegant bar.Marriott

name: Virgin Hotels Edinburgh
description: Featuring a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Virgin Hotels Edinburgh is located in the centre of Edinburgh, 300 metres from The Real Mary King's Close. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Camera Obscura and World of Illusions. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian options. Popular points of interest near Virgin Hotels Edinburgh include National Museum of Scotland, Edinburgh Castle and Royal Mile. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Fingal - A Luxury Floating Hotel
address: 1 Alexandra Dock Historic Port Of Leith, Edinburgh, EH6 7DX
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 23 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have hair dryers and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Edinburgh (Leith), Fingal - A Luxury Floating Hotel is within a 10-minute drive of Princes Street and Royal Mile. This 5-star hotel is 3.3 mi (5.3 km) from Edinburgh Castle and 2 mi (3.2 km) from Edinburgh Playhouse Theatre. Dining Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Optional Charges Early check-in is available for a fee (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. If you are planning to arrive after 10:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. name: Norton House Hotel & Spa
description: Set in a Victorian mansion in 55 acres of grounds, Norton House features a luxury spa, award-winning restaurant and boutique rooms with free internet. Edinburgh is a 20-minute drive, and Edinburgh Airport is 3 miles away. The 4-star bedrooms at Norton House Hotel & Spa, Edinburgh each have a modern bathroom with free toiletries and fluffy bathrobes. All rooms have a satellite TV/DVD player and a minibar. Guests can relax in the sauna, steam room or hydrotherapy pool in the luxurious spa. The health club also has a swimming pool with feature fountains, a fully equipped gym and treatment rooms. The Brasserie offers traditional British cuisine, and The Glass Lounge serves classic cocktails and afternoon teas. Set in leafy grounds, Norton House Hotel is just off the junction of M8 and M9 motorways. Free on-site parking is available, and Edinburgh Castle can be reached in 20 minutes by car. Please note all children must be accompanied by a parent or guardian over 18 years of age and Children's swim times apply and differ during holiday time. Please contact the hotel for more information.

name: Mercure Edinburgh City Princes Street Hotel
description: Discover the true beauty of Scotland capital at Mercure Edinburgh City Princes Street Hotel. This stylish 3-star destination provides guests with panoramic views of Edinburgh Castle, Old Town and Princes Street Gardens from its central location. After a day of sightseeing, experience a relaxed meal at the in-house Scotts on Princes Street restaurant before retreating to one of our stylish and comfortable rooms for the perfect night sleep.accorhotels.com

name: The Glasshouse Autograph Collection
description: Boutique luxury and grand tradition combine for spectacular results at The Glasshouse, Autograph Collection. Nestled in the heart of Edinburgh city centre, our 5-star historic hotel features a striking, 172-year-old façade melded into an ultra-sleek lobby space. Relax in our gorgeously appointed hotel rooms and suites, where boutique amenities and views of either the UNESCO World Heritage site of Calton Hill or Edinburgh's New Town await. Our 17 suites are each named after a Scotch whisky or Region; many of which you'll find in our recently renovated Snug Bar, which offers over 160 exclusive Scotch whiskies. For those seeking event space in Edinburgh city centre, we offer 5-star planning services and unique venues including an exterior roof garden with interor options and picturesque views of Calton Hill, perfect for any event. Nearby, iconic attractions like Edinburgh Castle, the Royal Mile, Princes Street and Leith beckon nearby. Discover an unforgettable luxury hotel experience at The Glasshouse.Marriott

name: Dakota Edinburgh
description: Dakota Edinburgh is a modern hotel with an award-winning restaurant located 30 minutes from Edinburgh city and 10 minutes from Edinburgh Airport. Enjoy a special experience near the quaint village of South Queensferry, nestled on the outskirts of Edinburgh. Bold styling and subdued tones set the backdrop for the ultimate comfort, our bedrooms at Dakota Edinburgh are designed to deliver on every detail. Crisp, high-thread cotton linen for a beautiful night’s sleep. Stunning bathrooms with invigorating monsoon showers. Home comforts of 48” HD TV with Sky Package & Sky Sports. It’s the detail that sets us apart from other hotels in Edinburgh. Immerse yourself in the heart & soul of Dakota: the Grill. Our urban-chic, open plan restaurant is famous for steak. We source our prime cuts from grass-fed UK-bred beef, supplied by Scottish family butchers. With the lightest touch, we season and grill our steaks to perfection over hot coals. Seafood lovers will discover a range of mouthwatering fish dishes, from simple grilled cod to our signature monkfish curry. Be tempted to complete your dining experience by selecting one of our deliciously divine desserts. You’ll find intensely flavoured, classically inspired dishes on our Dakota Grill restaurant menu, made from the finest seasonal produce. Relax by the fire, socialise with friends and enjoy your favourite cocktails at Dakota Bar. Choose to sip on a classic cocktail, explore our ever-evolving list of in-house originals, indulge in our premium spirits collection, or delight in a beautifully crafted coffee. Enjoy a short stroll down to the quaint, cobbled village high street just 15 minutes walk for views of the River Forth as well as all three famous bridges; Forth Rail Bridge, Queensferry Crossing, and Forth Road Bridge. Drive into Edinburgh city centre or take the train from nearby Dalmeny Station. Our stylish hotel is just a 30 minute drive from the city’s shopping, entertainment and cultural centre, ideally located for the world famous Edinburgh Fringe Festival and is just over the Queensferry Crossing from the Fife region. Dakota Edinburgh operates a complimentary airport transfer service midweek - this must be pre-booked, operates limited hours from 6am-10pm Mondays to Fridays only, and is subject to availability. Luxurious style, impeccable service and spectacular food. Treat yourself to an evening at Dakota Edinburgh and enjoy a special experience in the outskirts of Edinburgh.

name: The Place
description: Set across 3 Georgian townhouses, The Place Hotel offers 4-star accommodation and bar, in the heart of Edinburgh's city centre. A flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi are provided in each stylish room. The Playhouse Theatre and the shops and bars on George Street are a 5-minute walk from The Place Hotel. Edinburgh Waverley Station and Princes Street’s shops are a 10-minute journey on foot. The National Portrait Gallery is 0.6 miles from the property. Each spacious room has modern décor, a seating area and a work desk. Luxury toiletries are provided in every private bathroom, whilst some rooms have views towards the Firth of Forth estuary. The bar provides a luxury setting to relax with a drink.

name: The Raeburn
description: The Raeburn is set in the charming Stockbridge area of Edinburgh and within 20 minutes’ walk of Princes Street and the New Town. Housed in a beautiful Georgian property, this stylish hotel offers a restaurant and a bar. The Raeburn features modern design with attractive features including exposed stone walls, sash windows and tartan fabrics. All rooms have free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station, a minibar and tea and coffee-making facilities. The Raeburn’s smart, brasserie-style restaurant offers British dishes prepared with local produce. You can enjoy a drink in the bar, where there is a fireplace and bespoke chairs, as well as a terrace with parasols. Edinburgh’s beautiful old town and the castle are within a 25-minute walk of the hotel. Waverley and Haymarket railway stations are within 1.5 miles of the Raeburn, offering regular connections to Glasgow and the rest of the UK.

name: W Edinburgh
description: W Edinburgh does more than put you at the centre of Scotland’s historic and culturally rich capital city, it immerses you in the spirit of the festival capital of the world. Unique rooms and suites that are anything but expected. Breath-taking dining and specialty bars bring inspired new flavours to the city from our signature restaurant SUSHISAMBA and intimate cocktail bar, Joao’s Place, to our W Lounge and unique rooftop deck with the finest 360-degree views of Edinburgh and beyond.Marriott

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Edinburgh Airport
address: Edinburgh International Airport, 100 Eastfield Road, Edinburgh, EH28 8LL
description: Following our extensive refurbishment we are pleased to welcome you to DoubleTree by Hilton Edinburgh Airport, where we’ll greet you at check-in with a warm chocolate chip cookie. Our hotel is just five minutes from EDI Airport, and only 20 minutes from city center landmarks like Edinburgh Castle, Edinburgh Zoo, Princes Street. We’re also an ideal location if attending an event at the EICC or Royal Highland Centre. Our spacious guest rooms are styled in cool, calm tones and offer WiFi access, a 49-inch LCD TV, large work desk, USB charging ports, and daily newspaper. Upgrade to a Deluxe room to enjoy a welcome plate, mineral water, plush bathrobe, cosy slippers, and a later check-out time. Gather with friends and co-workers at The Space, a modern venue that merges restaurant, bar and lounge. Savour the diverse menus with locally sourced ingredients, and stay connected with WiFi access, charging stations and Bluetooth connectivity. For your convenience, our Edinburgh hotel also has 24-hour room service. Go for a swim in the heated indoor pool, take a class in the fitness center, or book a beauty appointment in our spa. Planning an event in Edinburgh? Our hotel provides 17 fully equipped meeting rooms, all with WiFi access, natural daylight and air-conditioning. Host a meeting, social gathering or wedding reception for up to 250 people. The hotel is also pleased to offer event catering, a business centre and ample car parking. Highlights: -Edinburgh hotel with parking and complimentary airport shuttle -155 spacious, well-appointed guest rooms and deluxe rooms -All-day dining at The Space, plus 24-hour room service -17-meter pool, fitness studio with group classes, and beauty spa -17 attractive meeting spaces, plus dedicated event staff -242 on-site car parking spacesHilton

name: Apex Haymarket Hotel
description: Designed with the traveler in mind, Four Points Edinburgh offers all the essentials needed to kick back and relax. Our stylish rooms, Italian inspired restaurant and location in the heart of Edinburgh, offers everything you could wish for the perfect stay. Discover our Best Brews program, featuring locally sourced craft beers on tap, confirming that everything we do shows our respect for great design and a sense of the local. Delicious breakfast to start the day right, casual and modern dining options in the evening, plus free WiFi throughout the hotel enable guests to stay in touch both socially and at work.Marriott

name: Apex City of Edinburgh Hotel
description: Cosy, convenient but most of all chic, the 4-star Apex City of Edinburgh Hotel sits at the foot of Edinburgh Castle, just off the must-see Royal Mile. Featuring boutique bedrooms and sumptuous suites with free Wi-Fi and access to fabulous leisure facilities just next door, an Apex adventure awaits. Designed with you in mind, find yourself living in luxury in these spacious rooms and suites. With a comfy bed and spacious en suite, enjoy taking a bath or shower with Antipodes organic toiletries, helping you to stay green while you stay clean. The flat screen TV will keep you entertained and the mini fridge and air conditioning ensure things can be kept fresh. Plus, the Master Suites even have Nespresso Coffee machines to make you feel right at home. Cots and highchairs are available on request. Since sharing is caring, guests can use the leisure facilities in the Apex Grassmarket Hotel, just next door. With weights, resistance apparatus, cardio machines, and a swimming pool, treat yourself to some tranquil time. Centrally located, just minutes from the infamous The Royal Mile and within walking distance of Lothian Road and Princes Street, this hotel is ideally located.

name: Parliament House Hotel
description: This beautifully restored 3-star hotel is in Edinburgh city centre, just 300 metres from Edinburgh Waverley Railway Station and Princes Street. Rooms each have a private bathroom and free Wi-Fi. The Parliament House Hotel has a quiet location at the foot of Calton Hill on a short, traditional cobbled lane. Each stylish room includes a TV and a hairdryer. Many shops, the spectacular Edinburgh Castle and the Scottish Parliament are less than a mile away. Edinburgh Bus Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. The MP's Bistro offers a full traditional cooked Scottish breakfast each morning, as well as continental options. The Bistro is not open for dinner. Guests can relax in comfortable armchairs in front of the open fire in the lounge bar. The upper floors are accessible by stairs or a lift. Please note essential remedial work on our lift will be taking place from the 8th January 2024 to 21st January 2024 inclusive. Our lift will not be operational during this time and therefore access to your rooms will be via the stairs.

name: Sheraton Grand Hotel & Spa, Edinburgh
description: Edinburgh’s UNESCO World Heritage city centre is best explored on foot and the Sheraton Grand is ideally located to discover its outstanding history and architectural beauty. Our 5-star luxury spa hotel has all the amenities you need. Wake up refreshed in our dreamily comfortable Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience™ beds and enjoy inspiring views of Edinburgh Castle from our Castle View Rooms & Suites. Spend your day exploring the Royal Mile or browsing the shops on George Street before escaping to Scotland's most renowned urban thermal spa experience, One Spa. Unwind in our iconic rooftop Hydropool to start your journey to wellbeing and rejuvenation. Find inner calm in our Thermal Suite, an unrivalled range of uplifting water, salt and heat experiences designed to help you rebalance and refresh your body and mind. Put your relaxation above everything else at Edinburgh’s ultimate spa. Stay in a Club & Spa Room for complimentary spa access & evening drinks and canapés in our Club Lounge.Marriott

name: Moxy Edinburgh Fountainbridge
description: Moxy Edinburgh Fountainbridge is a playful hotel designed to inspire creativity and offer space for both business and leisure travellers alike to relax. Our modern hotel in Edinburgh will always welcome you with a warm smile and refreshing cocktail, on us. We've got all the essentials covered in each of the bedrooms including 42-inch flat-screen TVs with Chromecast, USB ports as well as UK and European plug sockets, powerful showers with incredible MUK products and furiously fast and free Wi-Fi. Our city center hotel boats an awesome rooftop bar serving cocktails and craft beer with views of Edinburgh Castle alongside a cinema screen and outdoor terrace. In the lobby we've got everything you need to unwind with foosball, deeps sofas, local gin and food that will leave you wanting more. Not only that, we are located in the heart of it all with the EICC, Assembly Rooms and Princes Street on our doorstep - we've got you covered at Moxy Edinburgh Fountainbridge.Marriott

name: ibis Edinburgh Centre Royal Mile - Hunter Square
description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Edinburgh, ibis Edinburgh Centre Royal Mile's unrivalled location makes it the perfect base for exploring the city's iconic attractions. Steps away from the historic Royal Mile, the hotel ensures easy access to shopping, dining, nightlife, and business hubs. Our contemporary décor, amiable staff, and satisfying breakfast spread create a warm and inviting atmosphere. Each spotless, modern room offers a comfortable retreat, complete with essential amenities and free Wi-Fi.accorhotels.com

name: Malmaison Edinburgh City
address: Buchan House, 21-22 St Andrew Square, Edinburgh, EH2 1AY
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Edinburgh, Malmaison Edinburgh City offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Edinburgh Waverley station. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Malmaison Edinburgh City offers a Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Edinburgh Playhouse, Royal Mile and Camera Obscura and World of Illusions. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 9 km from Malmaison Edinburgh City.

name: The Rutland Hotel & Apartments
description: The glamorous Rutland Hotel has stylish rooms, a luxurious late-lounge, and a unique restaurant with a glass wine cellar. It is situated on the West End of Princes Street, with views of Edinburgh Castle. The Rutland is between Edinburgh's shopping and financial districts. The Scott Monument is a 15-minute walk away, and the EICC can be reached in under 10 minutes’ walk. Each unique room is chic and elegant. In-room treats include free Wi-Fi, a surround sound system, a flat-screen TV, bathrobes and GHD hair stylers. Guests can also enjoy homemade shortbread, real coffee and designer teas. A choice of cinemas and theatres can be reached in under 10 minutes on foot. It is also just 15 minutes’ walk through Prince’s Street Gardens to reach Edinburgh Castle.

name: Moxy Edinburgh Airport
description: Jet-setting into Edinburgh Airport, you can spot Moxy Edinburgh Airport as soon as you walk through the Arrivals entrance. So close by, so comfortable to stay in and packed with everything you might want and need from a hotel. Designed with affordability in mind, with food and beverage services available 24/7, and all the electronic stuff at hand. Traveling means meeting new people from everywhere. Whether you visit the Scottish National Gallery, Edinburgh Castle with Arthur's Seat east of it, the Royal Highland Show or the town of Queensferry, Moxy Edinburgh Airport is the perfect base for you. Play on in the lobby that is buzzing with excitement and chat with fellow travelers, exchange experiences and pictures, while you grab a cocktail or a local beer.Marriott

name: ibis Edinburgh Centre South Bridge - Royal Mile
description: We think you will agree that our location is perfect, but we all know it is what is on the inside that really counts. Our welcoming 24hr bar is stocked with a great selection of Scottish beers and spirits, our fibre Wi-Fi is free and speedy, and we have a beautiful outdoor courtyard for relaxing with a tipple - when the inclement Scottish weather behaves itself. And with a room upgrade option available, you will certainly enjoy plenty for your money at ibis Edinburgh Centre South Bridge.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh - Royal Mile
description: Located in the heart of the historic city of Edinburgh, Holiday Inn Express® Edinburgh – Royal Mile is where comfort and Scottish charm come together. Catch trains to Glasgow and London from the nearby Edinburgh Waverley station or take off from Edinburgh Airport (EDI), 30 minutes away. Situated just steps away from iconic landmarks and cultural treasures, such as the magnificent Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile, our hotel allows you to get lost in the buzzing atmosphere of the city. For those looking to explore the natural wonders of Edinburgh, we’re an 8-minute walk from Holyrood Park, offering breath-taking views of Arthur's Seat. Culture enthusiasts will be delighted to find the National Museum of Scotland and the Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh within easy reach, providing a glimpse into Scotland's fascinating past and its diverse botanical wonders. No visit to Edinburgh is complete without a trip to Calton Hill, just 12 minutes away, soak in panoramic views of the city and the striking Scottish National Monument. Additionally, history buffs can explore the impressive Royal Yacht Britannia and discover the grandeur of the Palace of Holyroodhouse, the official residence of the British monarch in Scotland. Unwind in our modern hotel. Rooms feature handy amenities like free Wi-Fi and ironing facilities. Start your day off right with our free Express Start™ breakfast, offering tasty hot and cold items.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Salisbury Hotel
description: This 4-star townhouse hotel is located within the quiet residential area of Newington, just 1 mile from Edinburgh’s historic Royal Mile and vibrant city centre. Stylish rooms have room service available and complimentary Wi-Fi, whilst the hotel houses the independently run Sofia's Lounge and offers limited free parking for guests. Modern luxury rooms retain original Georgian features and large windows. Some rooms have a four-poster bed, whilst all rooms have an LCD TV and a shower room with complimentary Duck Island toiletries. The Salisbury Hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Royal Mile, Holyrood Palace and Prince's Street’s shops. There are bus stops just 40 metres from the hotel, providing regular links to the city centre.

name: The Scotsman Hotel
description: Overlooking Carlton Hill, Princes Street Gardens and Waverley Station, the 4-star Scotsman Hotel was originally built in 1905. This majestic, listed building was once The Scotsman newspaper. Each unique room and suite at the Scotsman Hotel boasts individual features, including curved corner window bays with scenic views of the city and a marble-tiled en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy luxury Egyptian cotton linen, a 48-seat cinema, free Wi-Fi, free Scotsman Newspaper, and a privacy hatch for 24-hour room service. Situated a 1-minute walk from the Royal Mile and Princes Street, this hotel offers discounted parking, available at Edinburgh Waverley Station car park (long stay) on New Street, 5-10 minutes' walk away.

name: Orocco Pier
description: Boutique bedrooms and 3 levels of outside decking make the most of Orocco Pier's waterside setting. Historic South Queensferry is 7 miles from Edinburgh city centre on the Firth of Forth overlooking the iconic Forth Road Bridge. Fresh seafood is served in Orocco Pier's Samphire Seafood bar and grill, open Friday - Sunday. Guests can also enjoy the Antico Café bar, open daily from 8am. We serve a variety of cocktails, beverages and a full menu is served until 23:00 Bedrooms at Orocco Pier are stylish and most come with a view over the firth. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, DVD and a DVD collection. Luxury toiletries are featured in the en suite bathrooms. Some rooms include a view of the firth. Just 15 minutes' drive from Edinburgh Airport, Queensferry has rail links to Edinburgh city centre and north towards Perth and the Highlands.

name: Intercontinental Edinburgh The George
description: The InterContinental Edinburgh The George has been welcoming hotel guests since 1881. At its heart are five listed Georgian townhouses, built in 1775 as homes for Edinburgh’s most prosperous citizens. Today, The InterContinental Edinburgh The George offers all the luxuries of an InterContinental life in the heart of the Scottish capital. Explore our city’s stunning architecture, the iconic Edinburgh Castle and the cobbled streets of the Royal Mile, just moments away from our charming hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Du Vin Edinburgh
description: In Edinburgh’s historic Old Town, this Hotel Du Vin has uniquely styled bedrooms in a former city asylum. At the hotel’s heart is a French Bistro, serving produce from the Lothian region. A Plasma TV, Egyptian linen and luxury private bathroom is featured in each elegant room in this impressive building. Many rooms retain signature original features and roll top baths. Within the 4-star Hotel Du Vin Edinburgh is the chic Bistro Du Vin. Berwick lamb and pork and quality produce sourced from local suppliers is served in the relaxed French-style dining room. Guests can relax in the mezzanine bar, or sample a range of fine wines from around the globe in the Laroche tasting room. A walk-in humidor stocks an extensive range of luxury cigars. Edinburgh’s famous castle is 10 minutes’ walk away, while the shops of Princes Street are just a few minutes’ stroll further along.

name: Edinburgh Thistle Hotel
description: Edinburgh Thistle Hotel is situated in Edinburgh and is within a 10-minute walk of Haymarket Railway Station. This historic hotel is set in the heart of the city. There are a variety of facilities on offer to guests of Thistle, such as a concierge, free Wi-Fi and meeting facilities. There is private parking nearby for guests travelling with a car. Edinburgh Thistle Hotel features rooms equipped with luxury linen, a rain shower and tea and coffee making facilities, plus all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. They feature bottled water, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests are welcome to relax in the cosy lounge bar. A selection of dining options can also be found nearby. Edinburgh's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Thistle, with St Mary's Cathedral only a five-minute stroll away. It is also within walking distance of The Georgian House Edinburgh, Princes Street and Usher Hall.Revato

name: Kildonan Lodge Hotel
description: This elegant 4-star Victorian hotel offers luxurious rooms featuring iPod docks, flat-screen TVs, sherry and shortbread. Located only 1.5 miles from the Royal Mile, with direct bus route to the city centre right outside the hotel. Kildonan Lodge provides free Wi-Fi and a free private car park. Edinburgh city centre is a short 10-minute bus ride from Kildonan Lodge Hotel. Each elegant en suite room is individually decorated, providing smart TVs, luxury toiletries and complimentary sherry. Some rooms have four-poster beds. Full of Victorian character, The Kildonan Lodge has a lounge with an open fire. There is an honesty bar with traditional Scottish whiskies and local beers.

name: Ibis Styles Edinburgh Centre St Andrew Square
description: Just 2 minutes’ walk from Princes Street, ibis Styles St Andrew Square offers uniquely designed rooms in Edinburgh city centre. Around 10 minutes’ walk from Edinburgh Train Station, this ibis hotel has a 24-hour reception, a bar and restaurant and offers free WiFi. Each air-conditioned room features the ‘Sweet Bed’ by ibis Styles and has a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee facilities. Each has an en suite shower room with hairdryer. Continental breakfast is provided each morning at ibis Styles St Andrew Square, with a cold buffet. The restaurant serves meals each evening from 18:00 – 22:00, and the bar offers drinks from 12:00 – 01:00. This hotel is around 12 minutes’ walk from Edinburgh Castle, and 6 minutes from the Scottish National Gallery. Holyrood Park, home of Arthur’s Seat and the Salisbury Crags, is just over 1 mile from ibis Styles St Andrew Square.

name: Brewdog Doghouse Edinburgh
description: BrewDog DogHouse Edinburgh features free bikes, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Edinburgh. Located around 200 metres from Royal Mile, the hotel with free WiFi is also less than 1 km away from Camera Obscura and World of Illusions. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms include a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. At BrewDog DogHouse Edinburgh rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Edinburgh Waverley station, The Real Mary King's Close and National Museum of Scotland. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 10 km from BrewDog DogHouse Edinburgh.

name: The Torfin
description: Situated in Edinburgh and with Edinburgh Zoo reachable within 1 km, The Torfin features a terrace, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 3.7 km from Murrayfield Stadium, 4.8 km from EICC and 6.5 km from National Museum of Scotland. Royal Mile is 6.7 km away and The Real Mary King's Close is 6.8 km from the hotel. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The units have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving American, British and Scottish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Camera Obscura and World of Illusions is 6.8 km from The Torfin, while University of Edinburgh is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Murrayfield Hotel
description: Situated by Murrayfield Stadium, home of the Scottish Rugby Union, Murrayfield Hotel offers guest accommodation with free Wi-Fi, free parking, a pub, and a restaurant. Rooms at the Murrayfield Hotel feature an en suite bathroom, a flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. Deluxe bedrooms are located in the luxury Murrayfield House just 2 doors down from the hotel. Each of the rooms boast individually styled décor and furniture, an elegant en suite bathroom, a flat-screen TV integrated in a large mirror, and tea/coffee making facilities. The Hotel bar offers stylish surroundings with daily entertainment, and live sports and beer garden. The stylish restaurant offers a traditional Scottish and international menus. Edinburgh city centre and Edinburgh Zoo are both within a mile from the hotel. There is a regular bus service that runs from outside the hotel. Haymarket Rail Station can be reached in 20 minutes’ walk.

name: Leonardo Royal Edinburgh Haymarket
description: In Edinburgh city centre, less than 500 metres from Haymarket Rail Station, the Leonardo Royal Hotel Edinburgh offers great value, with modern family-friendly en suite rooms and a restaurant-bar. Spacious, stylish rooms at the Leonardo Royal Hotel Edinburgh each include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a work area, tea/coffee facilities and a private bathroom. Princes Street’s shops and bars and Princes Street Gardens with the famous Edinburgh Castle are all just a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Rosslyn Chapel can be reached via a local bus service. The Edinburgh International Conference Centre (EICC) is only 300 metres away. We are offering a full buffet breakfast.

name: Hotel Indigo Edinburgh
description: Experience the grace of Edinburgh’s 18th-century New Town in our boutique Hotel Indigo® Edinburgh, set in the buzzing heart of the city. Step inside and you’ll find an oasis of vibrant colours and contemporary comforts in our Georgian townhouse. After a long day’s shopping and sightseeing, cocoon yourself in your bespoke guest room, where every detail references Scottish creativity, from soft fabrics that caress to local artworks on the walls. You’ll love our indulgent bathrooms with rainfall showers and bespoke toiletries. At night, sip a dram of finest malt whisky in our cosy Bar and Lounge area. Minutes away, you’ll find the city’s best restaurants and nightlife, plus major Edinburgh Festival venues on our doorstep.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hampton by Hilton Edinburgh Airport
description: Hampton by Hilton Edinburgh Airport is perfectly placed within walking distance from the main terminal. Use the local transportation like bus and tram to reach the unique attractions like Edinburgh castle, BT Murrayfield Rugby Stadium and Edinburgh Zoo. This Edinburgh hotel includes relaxing 240 rooms all with complimentary WiFi, flat-screen HDTV, tea/coffee making facilities as well as seating area including a sofa bed. Our comfortable beds will help you rest after a long and exhausting flight.  Never miss your workout and enter our modern fitness centre with all new equipment, including cardio machines. Start your morning with a freshly prepared free breakfast in our colourful dining area and have a drink throughout the day at the bar, open 24 hours. Plan a meeting or special occasion in one of 2 versatile meeting rooms, both equipped with all the amenities you need. 24-hour business centre awaits you, so there is no chance you can miss your daily phone calls and business duties.Official Hotel Information

name: Waldorf Astoria Edinburgh - The Caledonian
description: Waldorf Astoria Edinburgh – The Caledonian is one of Edinburgh’s most significant landmarks. Standing proudly at the West End of Princes Street, this former Victorian railway building hotel nestles in the shadow of the imposing Edinburgh Castle. Its reputation for style and excellence has attracted international visitors and notable personalities for over one hundred years. Admire some of the best views in Edinburgh from our 241 guest rooms and suites and dine at our award-winning restaurant, Grazing by Mark Greenaway. At Waldorf Astoria Edinburgh – The Caledonian, experience the grandeur of the Peacock Alley, formerly the station concourse and ticket office, now a haven for afternoon tea and elegant evening drinks. Treat yourself to some of the finest Scottish whiskies at The Caley Bar, or indulge at the Waldorf Astoria Spa, a sanctuary of luxury and relaxation, home to a luxurious swimming pool, sauna, steam room, whirlpool, and two gyms. Waldorf Astoria Edinburgh – The Caledonian is one of the most splendid venues Edinburgh has to offer for meetings, events and weddings. Since opening in 1903, Waldorf Astoria Edinburgh – The Caledonian has staged many prestigious events, from extravagant wedding celebrations and star-packed parties to lavish corporate gatherings and grand banquets.Hilton

name: Hilton Edinburgh Carlton
description: Blending perfectly into the historic surroundings of the Royal Mile, Hilton Edinburgh Carlton is an iconic element of the city. The building dates back to 1900s and is part of the impressive North Bridge which links Edinburgh’s Old and New town together, giving you easy access to countless shopping, dining and entertainment. Once one of Edinburgh’s top department stores, the building was fully refurbished in 2016 to bring the décor back to its stylish best. Our modern rooms offer complimentary WiFi, ergonomic work area and Suite Dreams by Serta® beds with luxurious linens. Select an executive room or suite for extra space and amenities including access to the Executive Lounge, with complimentary breakfast and refreshments throughout the day. Savor succulent steaks along with a variety of timeless classics at Marco Pierre White Steakhouse Restaurant, boasting a relaxed ambience with a glamorous interior. For an indulgent afternoon tea and a vast bar menu, pop into our stylish lounge and bar area. 24-hour room service is also available. Work in the business center with secretarial services and complimentary WiFi before re-energizing in the hotel’s fitness room. Hilton Edinburgh Carlton features seven meetings rooms, all located on the first floor with natural daylight. Host an informal reception for up to 300 guests or a wedding for up to 180, with panoramic city views as a breathtaking backdrop. The feature staircase creates some of the best wedding photography in the city.Hilton

name: Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh Airport
description: With on-site parking, an airport shuttle and an inclusive breakfast, Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh Airport is ideal for a pre or post-flight stopover. Book one of our Park, Stay & Go packages for stress-free travel. Edinburgh Haymarket station is a 25-minute drive and Edinburgh Waverley station is a little further. Catch a tram or bus into the city centre to explore Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile and Princes Street. Go bouldering at the nearby Edinburgh International Climbing Arena or visit the giant pandas at Edinburgh Zoo, less than five miles away. Attend events at the Royal Highland Centre, a short stroll from the hotel, or head to matches at Murrayfield Stadium, a 20-minute drive away. Pick up last-minute holiday essentials at the Gyle Shopping Centre, or shop, eat and drink at the new St James Quarter in the city centre. Herriot Watt University is a 10-minute drive. For a spot of nature, head to the Pentland Hills. Here on business? Edinburgh International Conference Centre and the Edinburgh Technopole are within easy reach. After a day of adventure and travel, relax in our comfortable lounge area with an evening meal and ice-cold pint. Kickstart your morning with an inclusive buffet breakfast or grab & go if you’re in a rush.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Bruntsfield Hotel
description: If you're seeking a gorgeous and opportunely located hotel in Edinburgh city centre, try the Bruntsfield Hotel, WorldHotels Elite. This Victorian townhouse overlooks Bruntsfield Links Park, granting the rare opportunity to enjoy open greenery and plenty of city centre attractions. The hotel is within walking distance of Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street and The Royal Mile, and only a short drive from the panoramic views on offer at Arthur's Seat. With this abundance of sights and shops nearby, be rest assured you'll never be met by a dull moment during your stay. Residing in the speciality shopping district of Bruntsfield, this classically styled hotel boasts both traditional and modern features, and is only 10 minutes drive away from Edinburgh Waverly train station. Comfortable, quiet and individually designed bedrooms ensure a relaxing stay, whilst attentive staff are happy to recommend local places of interest, in and around the hotel and centre. Maintaining high brand standards and excellence in quality is second nature to the Bruntsfield Hotel. The hotel has proven that going the extra mile pays off, as the cleanliness and quality of all rooms and public areas has awarded the hotel an International Quality Award. This is a global recognition of excellence given to only a few hotels throughout the world and depicts the pride that the Bruntsfield Hotel takes in offering the highest level of quality. Thanks to this dedication, the hotel has quickly become one of the finest places to stay in Edinburgh and the perfect location to explore the compact capital city. Limited parking spaces are available on a first come first serve basis at a charge of GBP 12.00 per day payable locally. A per person pre-authorization taken of 30GBP on arrival. Please note our restaurant will be closed on Mondays and Tuesdays. The bar will open for drinks only on Monday and Tuesday evenings from 5 p.m.bestwestern.com

name: Ocean Mist Leith
description: Situated in Edinburgh and with Royal Yacht Britannia reachable within less than 1 km, Ocean Mist Leith features express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 3.2 km from Edinburgh Waverley station, 3.6 km from Royal Mile and 4.3 km from Camera Obscura and World of Illusions. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Edinburgh Playhouse. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms at Ocean Mist Leith have air conditioning and a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. National Museum of Scotland is 4.3 km from Ocean Mist Leith, while The Real Mary King's Close is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Point A Hotel Edinburgh Haymarket
description: Attractively set in Edinburgh, Point A Hotel Edinburgh Haymarket features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Popular points of interest nearby include The Real Mary King's Close, University of Edinburgh and Camera Obscura and World of Illusions. The property is non-smoking and is situated 100 metres from EICC. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Point A Hotel Edinburgh Haymarket. Speaking Greek, English, Spanish and Hungarian at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include National Museum of Scotland, Murrayfield Stadium and Royal Mile. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 8 km from Point A Hotel Edinburgh Haymarket.

name: Brooks Hotel
description: This refurbished boutique hotel is set in the West End of the city, only 0.6 miles from Edinburgh Castle. Brooks Hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi. Refurbished rooms include pocket-sprung mattresses and designer furniture. A TV, tea and coffee facilities and a hairdryer are all included, as is a modern bathroom with Parisien Metro tiles and Hansgrohe power shower. Guests can also relax in the beautiful courtyard garden. Full Scottish breakfasts are cooked-to-order daily, featuring local free range produce including haggis. A room service menu is available. Breakfast is served in the rooms. The Brooks also has an Honesty Bar stocked with local whiskey, beers and ales. Night porterage is available from 20:00 to 08:00. Edinburgh international Conference Centre is only 2 minutes’ walk away, while Haymarket Rail Station is only 5 minutes away by foot. Murrayfield Stadium is 1.5 miles away and Edinburgh Zoo is less than 10 minutes’ drive from Brooks Hotel.

name: The Scott
description: Newly Refurbished from Summer 2022, located at the foot of Arthur’s Seat on the edge of Holyrood Park, The Scott is a luxury hotel, originally built in the 1780s, that still boasts many of its original features, including the spectacular Red Room Bar, grand dining room, ornately carved wood panelling, fire places and stained glass windows. With no two rooms the same, the 36 junior suites and deluxe bedrooms blend modern luxury with the grandeur and grace of the original building. All bedrooms feature Elite™ Lily mattresses and the highest quality duvets, pillows and bed linens to ensure the best possible night’s sleep. The luxury experience is completed with beautifully designed en-suite bathrooms including fluffy towels and Isgha spa products. You’ll enjoy breakfast in our elegant dining room with windows overlooking the hotel’s private garden, and you can enjoy a drink or refreshment in our Red Room Bar, where we offer an honesty bar and self-service daily between the hours of Midday and 01.00am. Alternatively, our Scholar Restaurant and Bar lounge is situated in The Scholar Hotel next door, where the restaurant offers an informal evening a la carte service, and a menu packed with the finest Scotland has to offer. The Scott is located in City’s vibrant Southside area and is only a short walk away from Edinburgh’s world famous landmarks.

name: Apex Waterloo Place Hotel
description: Just around the corner from Calton Hill, the 4-star Apex Waterloo Place hotel epitomises luxury living in the heart of Edinburgh. With a stylish spa, swimming pool, restaurant, sumptuous rooms, and elegant suites, all with free WiFi, an Apex adventure awaits. Find yourself relaxing in your room a bed, flat screen TV and spacious en suite with a bath, walk-in shower, and Antipodes organic toiletries to help you stay green whilst you stay clean. The mini fridge and air conditioning will keep things fresh and some rooms have a Nespresso Coffee machine so you can make yourself at home. Cots and highchairs are available on request. Book in for a relaxing spa treatment and unwind in the fitness and wellness facilities including a swimming pool with poolside seating, sauna, and steam room. If you’d rather sweat it out another way, head to the fitness suite – great for working up an appetite… Serving traditional Scottish cuisine, take delight in every bite at the award-winning Elliot’s restaurant. With elegant Georgian features and a grand fireplace, the bright bar offers a range of fine wines and quality spirits. Situated in Edinburgh’s Old Town, just off Princes Street, the hotel is 550 yards from the historical Royal Mile. Plus, it’s just a 5minute walk to Edinburgh Waverley Railway Station and 15 minutes on foot from Edinburgh Castle.

name: Hampton by Hilton Edinburgh West End
description: Hampton by Hilton Edinburgh West End is situated in the heart of Edinburgh, close to most major attractions and points of interests - Old Town, Edinburgh Castle, Camera Obscura as well as Edinburgh International Conference Center are within walking distance of the hotel. Featuring 228 non-smoking guest rooms, this West End hotel offers its guests the perfect base for their business or leisure stay in the city. HDTVs, double sleeper sofas, work area and laptop-size safe are just part of the in-room amenities of this Edinburgh hotel. A fully-equipped fitness centre is available on-site and free hot breakfast is included in every stay and offered daily in the airy restaurant. For the convenience of the modern business traveller, the hotel offers a meeting room, business centre, printing and fax services. Edinburgh Airport is just 7 miles away.Official Hotel Information

name: Village Hotel Edinburgh
description: Village Edinburgh has everything under one roof including stylish bedrooms - with big cosy beds - huge TVs and great showers – state-of-the-art gym with all the latest tech - and Village Pub and Grill where you can tuck into delicious food and drink. Check in and check out your room. Snuggle up in your super comfy bed - watch your huge TV and enjoy a great shower. Feeling peckish - order room service from the Pub and Grill and devour in private whilst surfing our super speedy WiFi. There is a hairdryer and ironing board in every room and some nifty gadgets too. Enjoy dining in either the Pub or Grill. We are famous for our hot wings - juicy burgers and cool beers - delicious steaks and great wines. You will love our delicious selection of pub classics - Sunday lunch and great offers throughout the week. Love live sport - Come and relax in our pub whilst watching your team play live on the big screen. We also have a Starbucks coffee shop for your caffeine fix. Do not forget to pack your gym kit because our pool and leisure facilities are too good to miss. We are not talking about a pokey fitness centre at the back of the hotel - here you will find an incredible range of state-of-the-art fitness equipment - classes and large pool. Need somewhere to work and meet? If your stay is for business or you are attending a meeting with us then expect great service and facilities at hand. Our fresh conference rooms with great dining options will keep your brain in power all day long. Plus those added extras like Clickshare technology - online food ordering and wireless charging pads. We cannot wait to welcome you to Village Edinburgh.Official Hotel Information

name: Malmaison Edinburgh
description: This boutique hotel sits on the banks of the Forth in Leith, and boasts a state-of-the art gym, free parking and a stylish bar. Edinburgh city centre is just 10 minutes’ drive away. Each chic, spacious room at Malmaison Edinburgh is individually designed with a luxurious bed and a satellite TV. Many rooms also have views of the port, and all have free internet. The vibrant Malmaison Brasserie offers British classic cuisine, served in sophisticated surroundings, and made with local produce. There is a well-stocked wine cellar, the Mal Bar for cocktails and a terrace for al fresco dining and drinking.

name: Holiday Inn Edinburgh
description: A stylish Edinburgh hotel next to Edinburgh Zoo, with an indoor pool and a fitness centreNear the M8 motorway, Holiday Inn® Edinburgh hotel is handy for the city centre and all its attractions.You can take a tour of the 16th-century, antique-furnished rooms at Holyrood Palace, official Scottish residence of the Queen, just a 20-minute bus ride from the hotel, or cheer on a game at Murrayfield Stadium, which hosts Scotland's rugby union home matches. The high street shops of the modern Gyle Shopping Centre are 10 minutes away by bus, from the stop just outside the hotel. Haymarket train station, also a short bus ride away, is served by trains across Scotland and the north of England. Here for work? You're a 10-minute drive from Edinburgh Park–based companies, or you can host meetings at the hotel in 14 flexible conference spaces with panoramic views.At this hotel you can enjoy:- Free WiFi- Limited free on-site parking- 24-hour room service- Kids stay and eat freeEach welcoming room has a flat-screen TV and a pillow menu. Look forward to an invigorating power shower in the morning, or get energised with a visit to the well-equipped fitness room or indoor pool. Relax at day's end in the spa or sauna, then dine on European cuisine in the hotel's casual restaurant and chat over drinks in the relaxed lounge bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: St Christopher's Edinburgh Old Town
address: 32 Market St, Edinburgh, Old Town, Edinburgh, EH1 1QB
description: With a stay at St Christopher's Edinburgh Old Town - Hostel in Edinburgh (Old Town Edinburgh), you'll be steps from Princes Street and 6 minutes by foot from Royal Mile. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.Hotels.com

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Edinburgh City Centre
description: Stylish, modern conveniences meet old-world charm at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Edinburgh City Centre. Set in the center of the city, this 1892 listed building offers a fantastic location within walking distance of many of Edinburgh’s famous attractions. We look forward to welcoming you to the hotel and to Edinburgh with a warm chocolate-chip cookie at check-in. Make yourself comfortable in an elegant guest room with amenities for work and relaxation, including WiFi access. Select a spacious suite or deluxe room for spectacular views of Edinburgh Castle. Dine, for breakfast in the Bread Street Brasserie. With a focus on fresh, quality ingredients, this Edinburgh restaurant offers a delightful menu with options to suit any occasion and palate. After a busy day exploring the city, unwind with a refreshing cocktail in Monboddo Bar or reinvigorate with a workout in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center. With its central location steps from the financial district, our dedicated glass-fronted Conference Venue is ideal for meetings in Edinburgh. Allow our events staff to lend a hand, providing the latest A/V equipment rental and professional services. Choose the stunning Penthouse for a memorable, bespoke Edinburgh wedding or celebration. The Penthouse offers a truly exceptional experience with its outdoor decking area and views of the city skyline, the castle and the River Forth on the horizon.Hilton

name: Leonardo Edinburgh Murrayfield
description: Featuring a bar, Leonardo Edinburgh Murrayfield is located in Edinburgh in the Lothian region, 2.4 km from Edinburgh Zoo and 5 km from Murrayfield Stadium. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 6.1 km from EICC. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel each room is equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A continental, Full English/Irish or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Leonardo Edinburgh Murrayfield offers 4-star accommodation with an indoor pool, fitness centre and sauna. Camera Obscura and World of Illusions is 7.4 km from the accommodation, while The Real Mary King's Close is 7.6 km away. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 5 km from Leonardo Edinburgh Murrayfield.

name: voco Edinburgh - Royal Terrace, an IHG Hotel
description: Voco™ Edinburgh - Royal Terrace is nestled within historic gardens at the edge of Edinburgh's New Town. The voco™ Edinburgh - Royal Terrace is a 10-minute walk from Edinburgh Waverly station, and a 25-minute taxi ride from Edinburgh Airport. You'll be just a 20-minute walk from Edinburgh Castle. The National Museum of Scotland, the Palace of Holyrood house and the city's main shopping streets are on our doorstep, along with the new St. James Quarter. Captivating exteriors & stylish interiors, our warm and genuine hosts offer true Scottish hospitality; making our hotel your ‘home away from home’ with unique spaces to share and connect. The hotel is home to the Terrace Restaurant and Garden, where guests can take in a piece of nature in the city. Additionally, showing off Scotland's whisky scene, The Nook, showcases boutique cocktails and an extensive whisky menu.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Grassmarket Hotel
description: Boasting stylish rooms with plasma-screen TVs and wall-sized magnetic maps, this refurbished hotel is 800 metres from Edinburgh Waverley Rail Station and 300 metres from the Royal Mile. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Bluetooth stereo connectivity feature in each modern along with an en suite bathroom featuring a rainfall shower. Grassmarket Hotel offers bike hire and packed lunches can be ordered from the property. The Grassmarket Hotel is in the lively and historic Grassmarket area. There are pubs, clubs, bars, restaurants and shops nearby. The shops of Princes Street are 750 metres away.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Edinburgh West
description: Embark on an adventure at the Courtyard Edinburgh West. Ideally located to explore the capital city and all the famous attractions, while enjoying the green space around the hotel. The incredible Pentland Hills are just a short drive from the hotel where you can walk, fish, mountain bike, so you can visit the city and the country all in one stay. Relax and unwind in our spacious, modern hotel rooms boasting all the creature comforts. Enjoy something to eat in The Avenue, our all-day casual dining destination.If arriving by car we have complimentary onsite parking for your convenience, or we are less than a 10minute journey from Edinburgh Airport. With numerous busses stopping outside the hotel running straight into the city centre it couldn't be easier to get around. With five modern event spaces, our hotel is also a smart choice for a productive business event in Edinburgh. Start planning your trip today, we can’t wait to welcome you.Marriott

name: Ibis Budget Hotel Edinburgh Park
address: Edinburgh Business Park 6 Lochside View, Edinburgh, EH12 9DH
description: Our fuss-free hotel sets out everything you need without all the unnecessary extras, so you enjoy budget-friendly room rates without missing out on anything critical. Modern, well-equipped and staffed with one of the friendliest teams around, ibis Budget Edinburgh Park boasts 161 cosy rooms and a 24 hours cafe for refreshments. Car parking is limited and operates on first come, first serve basis. We are not able to guarantee car parking spot.accorhotels.com

name: voco Edinburgh - Haymarket
description: voco Edinburgh Haymarket is a modern hotel that guarantees you a stay that is as individual as it is indulgent. Offering distinctive design, cosy bedding, luxury amenities and delicious food, whilst also being ideally located to explore all of Edinburgh’s famous attractions! Princes Street and Princes Street Gardens are just a short walk from the hotel, the world-renowned Edinburgh Castle is a 20 minute walk away and the hotel is also within walking distance to both BT Murrayfield and Tynecastle Stadiums. In addition, the hotel is located a few minutes’ walk from the Edinburgh International Conference Centre (EICC) and close to The Usher Hall so is the ideal location if attending an event, conference or concert. Edinburgh Zoo is also a short car journey from the hotel. The Blossom Restaurant & Bar provides a welcoming atmosphere where you can unwind your mind after a long day of work, or after exploring and discovering the beauty of Edinburgh.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Apex Grassmarket Hotel
description: In the vibrant Grassmarket area, the Apex Grassmarket Hotel has a sauna, a pool, a gym, an award-winning restaurant, and free WiFi for guests to enjoy. Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle are 15 minutes’ walk away. The leisure facilities at Apex Grassmarket Hotel include Technogym fitness equipment and a swimming pool. Metro Bar & Brasserie offers seasonally rotating menus. Each luxurious room has a widescreen TV, an en suite bathroom with shower and free luxury toiletries, and tea/coffee making facilities and bottled water. The Royal Mile is 600 metres from the property, and the National Museum of Scotland is 550 metres away. Edinburgh Airport is a 25-minute drive from the Apex Grassmarket Hotel.

name: Prestonfield House
description: This luxurious 5-star retreat has a fine-dining restaurant and romantic bedrooms about 3 km from the Royal Mile. Prestonfield is surrounded by gardens and a golf course. Buses to the city centre are a 5-minute walk away. Parking is free. Each stylish room at Prestonfield House has antique furnishings, free Wi-Fi, plasma TV, a stocked minibar and views of the gardens and parkland. Rhubarb Restaurant serves excellent Scottish cuisine and traditional afternoon teas. The terraces, drawing room and gardens are relaxed, beautiful places to unwind.

name: Kimpton Charlotte Square
description: Overlooking one of Edinburgh’s prettiest private garden squares, Kimpton Charlotte Square Hotel consists of seven interconnected Georgian townhouses. Outside is where you’ll find the New Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site that’s delightfully removed from the city’s tourist hubs. But it’s inside where things really get interesting. The interior blends handsome woods, plush fabrics, and rich pops of color—and, yes, just a touch of tartan—to luxurious effect. And with a magnetic inner courtyard, an acclaimed Middle Eastern restaurant and award-winning Scottish restaurant, it’s no wonder the hotel has become a natural meeting point.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Novotel Edinburgh Park
description: The 4-star Novotel Edinburgh Park Hotel is ideal for business and leisure. Located next to Edinburgh Park train station and directly on the Edinburgh tramway. The hotel is one of the most accessible venues in the capital, has 100 spaces for parking and coach parking premises. With 170 spacious and contemporary rooms, this is the perfect spot to unwind after a meeting or a busy day exploring. The hotel combines comfort with a modern environment where you can work, relax and re-energise.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh City Centre
description: A modern Edinburgh hotel in a Georgian building within walking distance of the city's top attractions Holiday Inn Express® - Edinburgh City Centre hotel is a 10-minute walk from Edinburgh Waverley station in the city's New Town. It's a short stroll to the York Place tram stop, which has a direct connection to Edinburgh Airport (EDI). The Edinburgh Playhouse theatre and OMNI Edinburgh's restaurants and cinemas are right across the road. Princes Street and George Street's shops are a few minutes' walk away. You can ramble over the ramparts of Edinburgh Castle, 20 minutes' walk from the hotel. Or experience more royal flavour, less than a mile from the hotel, at the Palace of Holyroodhouse, the Queen's official Scottish residence. Amble through the expansive Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh, half an hour on foot from the hotel, or wander into Princes Street Gardens to spot the huge floral clock. Business guests are on the doorstep of the financial district around St. Andrew Square and George Street, while the Edinburgh International Conference Centre is less than 10 minutes' drive away. The hotel has a smart meeting rooms. Enjoy free Wi-Fi and an inclusive hot Express Start Breakfast. A nearby Fitness Centre is available to guests. Unwind after a busy day's sightseeing over a cool beer in the lounge bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Cairn Hotel
description: The Cairn Hotel is 800 metres from Edinburgh Waverley Rail Station and the shops, theatres and nightlife of Princes Street. It offers free WiFi and has a breakfast room. The Cairn Hotel is in Edinburgh city centre, close to Calton Hill. The hotel is in a quiet location 300 metres from the Playhouse Theatre and has easy access to public transport. All of the rooms have showers, TVs and tea/coffee. Hair dryers, irons and ironing boards are available on request. There is a bar area with a large flat-screen TV.

name: Kick Ass Greyfriars (18+)
description: Boasting a shared lounge, a terrace as well as a bar, Kick Ass Greyfriars (18+) is situated in the centre of Edinburgh, 800 metres from Royal Mile. Located around 400 metres from National Museum of Scotland, the hostel with free WiFi is also 800 metres away from University of Edinburgh. The accommodation features evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. The rooms at the hostel are fitted with a shared bathroom and bed linen. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian options. You can play billiards at this 4-star hostel. Popular points of interest near Kick Ass Greyfriars (18+) include The Real Mary King's Close, Camera Obscura and World of Illusions and Edinburgh Waverley station. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Old Waverley Hotel
description: Situated within a 10-minute walk of Edinburgh Bus Station, The Old Waverley Hotel is a convenient base while in Edinburgh. This modern hotel is set in the heart of the city. There are a variety of facilities on offer to guests of Edinburgh Old Waverley Hotel, such as a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour room service. Just moments from nearby bars and clubs, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the local nightlife. Hotel Old Waverley has 86 rooms, all of which are filled with a range of amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the local area with use of Edinburgh Waverley Railway Station, which is within a five-minute walk of the hotel. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests are invited to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the breakfast room, or there is a selection of well-known eateries in the area to discover. Old Waverley is conveniently located for sightseeing in Edinburgh, with Princes Street on the property's doorstep. It is also within walking distance of University of Edinburgh, Edinburgh Castle and the National Museum of Scotland.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Edinburgh City Centre
address: 80 High Street The Royal Mile, Edinburgh, EH1 1TH
description: Radisson Blu Hotel, Edinburgh City Centre features a spa/ fitness centre, bar and bedrooms with free Wi-Fi. Waverley train station is just a 5-minute walk away. Each room has a private bathroom with free toiletries. Rooms also feature a TV with satellite channels, and a work area. The hotel features an indoor heated swimming pool, a sauna and a fully equipped fitness suite. There is a 24-hour front desk and business centre. Itchycoo Bar and Kitchen overlooks the Royal Mile, and serves a varied and seasonal menu. There is also a restaurant, offering traditional Scottish breakfast. Just a 10-minute walk from Edinburgh Castle, Radisson Blu Hotel, Edinburgh City Centre is 500 meters away from lively Princes Street. Holyrood Park and Palace are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Delta Hotels by Marriott Edinburgh
description: Whether traveling to Edinburgh for work or vacation you’ll enjoy the 4-star comfort and excellent service of the Delta Hotels by Marriott Edinburgh. We are ideally located two miles from Edinburgh Airport and only 15 minutes from the historic city centre. On-site parking and public transport links via bus, tram and rail make it easy to explore the city from our hotel. Our deluxe double/double rooms are perfect for families and our Suites are ideal for anyone who needs extra living space. Relax in our heated indoor pool or maintain your fitness regime in our gym. Start or end your day in Edinburgh in Cast Iron Grill or enjoy light bites and drinks in Brew Bar.Marriott

name: The Scholar
description: The Scholar is a newly refurbished hotel located in the beautiful grounds of the Pollock Estate, just a few minutes’ walk from Arthurs Seat, Holyrood Park and the Meadows and within walking distance of all of the City’s world famous landmarks. The local Southside neighbourhood buzzes with small restaurants, bars and an eclectic mix of independent shops. All bedrooms are luxurious and feature large beds, Elite mattresses and quality linen to ensure the best possible night’s sleep. All rooms also include a TV with a whole host of channels, award winning Novus tea and cafetiere coffee and a desk with ample work space. Our large bathrooms include rainfall showers, Arran Aromatics toiletries and fluffy towels. The hotel’s contemporary restaurant, bar and garden dining area proudly serve the highest quality breakfast, lunch and dinner, focussing on using locally sourced Scottish ingredients, allowing you to sample Edinburgh’s excellent food and drink scene without needing to leave the hotel. We also offer free Wifi throughout the hotel and free onsite parking including a large number of electric car charging points. Our friendly staff go above and beyond to make this the perfect place for to stay all types of travellers.

name: Cumberland Hotel
description: In Edinburgh’s West End, the Cumberland Hotel is situated in attractive grounds and offers limited paid parking. Parking can be booked and paid on arrival subject to availability. Princes Street is within easy reach and Edinburgh Airport is a 16-minute drive away. A full Scottish breakfast, along with continental and vegetarian options, is available each morning. There is a residents' lounge, 2 bars and beer gardens at the front and rear for guests to relax and enjoy a drink outdoors. Cumberland Hotel is set within 2 elegant historically listed Victorian buildings, with original features and large rooms. Each room has a TV and facilities for making tea and coffee. There is a bus stop just outside the hotel, with a regular service to and from the city centre.
